JAMAICA

6 DAYS/5 NIGHTS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ min_height=”3270.2px” custom_padding=”38px||29px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=””][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin=”-31px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”30px|0px|21px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=”” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

ITINERARY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”13px|auto||200px||” custom_padding=”32px|0px|26px|0px|false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ module_alignment=”center” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”133px” custom_margin=”-22px||-6px|||” custom_padding=”0px||1px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 01: ARRIVAL AT MONTEGO BAY

Oozing Caribbean spirit from every cove, a Jamaican vacation is the ideal way to enjoy an island getaway. With the distinctive sound of Bob Marley drifting through the air, sandy beaches, sun and culture, tropical fruit and coconut providing a taste of paradise. Upon arrival you will be transferred to the hotel.

Overnight in Montego Bay.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”0px||0px|3px||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 02: MONTEGO BAY

Today a scenic tour awaits you along the North Coast with a stop at Columbus Park, an open-air museum and the opportunity to pick up some bargains at Ocho Rios. Travel along Jamaica’s scenic north coast passing Falmouth, a picturesque fishing village. Then move on to Discovery Bay where Christopher Columbus first landed in Jamaica in 1494. Stop for shopping in beautiful Ocho.

Enjoy Dunn’s River Falls – climb this amazing work of Mother Nature. Scale the 600 ft limestone rock formation as water cascades past you and splashes into the ocean below. Definitely experience of a lifetime!!!

Overnight in Montego Bay.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”118px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”||4px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 03: MONTEGO BAY – NEGRIL

Today post breakfast you will be transferred to Negril – a Caribbean beach destination which attracts one and all. Today relax on the white sandy beaches and soak up the sun.

Overnight in Negril.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”304px” custom_margin=”-1px||-1px||true|” custom_padding=”5px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 04: NEGRIL

Embark on an adventure today when you go into the YS FALLS.

YS Falls is one of Jamaica’s finest natural attractions, offering the opportunity to experience the beauty of a series of untouched and unspoiled waterfalls on the South Coast of Jamaica.  It has seven waterfalls, several of which cascade into natural pools, and lush gardens. This experience begins with a short open-air ride through the Jamaican countryside passing lush vegetation and rushing rivers along the way. After your brief journey you’ll be greeted by a magnificent natural setting that features tasteful ecological structures, play areas, a natural spring pool and the seven flowing tiers of the majestic YS Falls. You can make your way along crafted wooden walkways to the top of the falls to enjoy a refreshing dip in the crisp natural pools.  

Overnight in Negril.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”203px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 05: NEGRIL

Today proceed to  Appleton Estate tour.

Enjoy an Appleton rum punch while the resident donkey demonstrates how juice was extracted from the sugar cane in the 18th century. Visit the Distillery & Ageing House, where the different methods of distillation are shown. Participate in the crushing of the sugar cane and tasting of the freshly squeezed cane juice and molasses. An authentic Jamaican style lunch will be served.

Try out all the great tasting rums in the Appleton lounge.

Overnight in Negril.

           

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”176px” custom_margin=”2px||24px|||” custom_padding=”0px||1px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Arial,Oswald,Georgia”]

 DAY 06: DEPARTURE FROM NEGRIL

Breakfast at the hotel.

Check out of the hotel and transfer to airport for flight to next destination/home.

HAVE A SAFE TRIP!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”More Places” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ hover_enabled=”0″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off” module_alignment=”center” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ min_height=”0px” custom_margin=”-2px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”1px|0px||0px||”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb url=”http://www.facebook.com/pages/Discover-Destinations/156630901051625″ use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%291%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ _builder_version=”4.6.6″][/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb url=”http://twitter.com/#!/discoverdest” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%292%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ _builder_version=”3.15″]
